description:
Remote Desktop Manager Agent enables Remote Desktop Manager to securely execute local scripts via the virtual channels of an RDP session.

Execute an ad hoc command line, PowerShell commands/script, Run command or launch a simple RDM Scripts/Tools from a Remote Desktop Manager client to multiple remote sessions all at once with logging. Simply have the agent installed and running on each remote session, use RDM to launch the RDP sessions and execute the commands with a few clicks.

More information: http://blog.devolutions.net/2014/06/rdm-agent.html
summary: Remote Desktop Manager Agent extends the RDP protocol to allow remote script execution.
author: Devolutions inc.
